alert.note: Alert for Poweshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 3:29PM CST until January 05 at 12:00PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Multifaceted Hazardous Winter Weather Tonight... .Several different hazardous weather elements will affect Iowa tonight along and behind the passage of a sharp cold front. This will include widespread strong and gusty winds, snow showers north, blowing snow from new and previous snows, and bitter cold wind chills. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Areas of blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Much of southeast Iowa. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
